subject: Football
Shooting (Sport)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Plaxico Burress found himself in court many times before last November’s nightclub shooting in Manhattan. But it was usually because of unpaid debts. Burress has been sued at least nine times. People in several states said he failed to pay a debt, damaged their car or did not pay his taxes.
